titleStmt.title: SII 12.166: original edition by V. Venkatasubba Ayyar
No. 166. (A.R. No. 261 of 1913). ŚIṄGĀRATTŌPPU NEAR CHIDAMBARAM, CHIDAMBARAM TALUK, SOUTH ARCOT DISTRICT. ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE BHĪMĒŚVARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This inscription dated in the 11th year, records a sale of 9 mā of land called ‘Koḷḷampaḷḷam’ in Iḷaṉāṅgūr alias Sundaraśōḻapāṇḍyanallūr situated in Gaṅgaikoṇḍaśōḻa-pēriḷamaināḍu and forming the western hamlet of Chidambaram, for 5,000 kāśu to the temple of Tirukkaḷāñchēḍi-Uḍaiyār at Paṇṇaṅguḍichchēri alias Parakēsarinallūr, a hamlet of the independent village Perumbaṟṟappuliyūr, by Ālachchaṉ Poṉṉambalakkūttaṉ Nṛittarājan of the village. It may be noted that the rights and privileges pertaining to these lands including facilities for irrigation were conveyed to the purchaser in carefully worded documentary language so as to avoid disputes later.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī ḷa cakalapuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrī kopperuñciṅkatevaṟku yāṇṭu 10 1vatu meṣaṉāya
tiyati 5lt taṉiyūr perumpaṟṟappuliyūr Ālaccaṉ poṉṉampalakkūttaṉ nṛttarācaneṉ . Ivvūr piṭā
kai paṇṇaṅkuṭicceri Āṉa parakecarinallūril EḻuntaruḷiIrukkum ṉāyaṉār tirukkaḷāñceṭiUṭaiyār koyi
l Āticaṇṭeśvarartevar tiruvaruḷāl Ikkoyil śrī māheśvarakaṅkāṇi ceyvārkaḷukkum cikāriyañ
ceyvāṟkum tevarkaṉmmi koyilkkaṇakkaṟkum nāṉ nilavilaippiramāṇattiṭṭuk kuṭutta paricāvatu . Iṉṉāya
ṉāṟku tiruṉāmattukkāṇiĀka Iṟṟaiṉāḷāl viṟṟukkuṭutta ṉilam Ivvūr melpiṭākai kaṅkai koṇṭacoḻa
periḷamaināṭṭu Iḷaṉāṅkūrāṉa cuntaracoḻapāṇṭiyanallūrppāl śrīpañcavaṉmātevivatikku meṟkku co⌈
ḷentiraciṅkaṉ vāykkālukkut teṟku muṉṟāṅkaṇṇāṟṟu mutalccatirattu Eṉṉuṭaiya koḷḷam paḷḷam Eṉ
ṟuperuṭaiya nilattiṉukku Ellai . nilakaṇṭaṉ mātevaṉ Uyyakkoṇṭapiḷḷai nilattukku kiḻakkum pattiratti
rucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyār nilattukku nirpāykiṟa vāykkālukkut teṟkum meṟpaṭiyāṉ nilattukku meṟkum ciparāntakappe
rāṟṟukku vaṭakkum Āka Ivvicainta Iṉṉānkellai Uḷpaṭak kolaḷavāka mikutikkuṟaimai Uḷḷaṭaṅka vanta kaṇṇaṅ
kuṭaiyāṉ Iḷamai pakkal koṇṭuUṭaiya nilam � � tolppaṭṭaṭai pāratāyaṉ tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyāṉ tirukkaḻi
ppālaiUṭaiyāṉ pakkal koṇṭuUṭaiya vilaiolaippaṭi nilam � Āka nilam � � Iṉṉilam 9patu māvu
m melaiOṭaiyil Oruvāytturavum Ettamum Ettanilai cikkuḻiyum muṉṉūṉṟi piṉṉūṉṟiyum Inta Ettame tuṭaṅki kiḻakku
ṉokkil kolakalattāl Iṟaiccu koṭupokiṟa vāykkālum Āka Ittaṉaiyum viṟṟukkuṭuttu koḻvatāṉa Emmilicainta vi
laipporuḷ Aṉṟāṭucellu naṟkkācu 5 1000 Ikkācu Aiyyāyiramum koṇṭeṉ koṇṭa pari cāvatu . mulaparuṣaiyār Eḻu
tiṉa mahāvyavasthaippaṭi nāṅkaḷ koṇṭu kaṭamaikku kaikoṇṭu muṟkakuṟitta nilam Oṉpatu māvum viṟṟukkuṭutte
ṉ Ikkoyil śrīmāhoeśvarakaṅkāṇi ceyvārkaḷukkum cikāriyañ ceyvārkkum tevarkaṉmi koyilkkaṇakkaṉukkum Āla
ccaṉ poṉṉampalakkūttaṉ nṛttarācaneṉ . Iṉṉilattukku meṟpaṭi pāyumnir pāyavum vārunir vāravum Iṟaikkunir Iṟaikkavum peṟu
vatākavum . Iṉṉilattukku vanta taṭaiyum Iṭaiyūṟum tirttu Āḻvippataṟku Eṉvāḻve Āḻcci Iṟaippuṉai Ākavutākavum . Itukku Itu
ve vilaiĀvaṇamum poṟuṭmāvaṟutip poruḷc cilaOlaiyum Ituve Āvutākavum . Itu vallatu veṟu poruṭmāvvaṟutipporuḷc cilaOlai
kāṭṭakkaṭavutallātākavum . Ippaṭi sammatittu muṟkuṟitta kācu 5 1000 yiramum muṟkuṟitta paṭiye nerāka kaikkoṇṭu muṟkuṟitta nilam Oṉpatu
māvum muṟkuṟitta Uṭaimaikaḷum Urimaikaḷum mulaOlaippaṭikaḷālum pottakappaṭiyālum Uḷḷa Uṭaimaikaḷum Urimaikaḷum Āka It
taṉaiyum viṟṟukkuṭutteṉ Inta tirukkaḷāñceṭi Uṭaiyār koyil Āticaṇṭeśvavarar tevar tiruvaruḷāl Ikkoyil cimākeśvara ka
ṇkāṇi ceyvārkaḷum cikāriyañ ceyvārum tevarkaṉmmi koyil kaṇakkaṉum Ālaccaṉ poṉṉampalakkūttaṉ nṛttarācaneṉ . Ip
ṇikka Eḻutineṉ Ivūrk karaṇattāṉ puliyūrkiḻavaṉ tevakaḷtevaṉāṉa kuṉikkumpirāṉe ṉivai Eṉ Eḻuttu . Ippaṭi Icaintu
Iṉṉilam Oṉpatu māvum Ikkācu 5 1000 yirattukkume viṟṟu vilaip piramāṇattiṭṭukkuk kuṭutteṉ Ālaccaṉpoṉṉampala
kkūttaṉ nṛttarācaneṉ . Ivai Eṉ Eḻuttu . Iṉilattu mulaOlai 2ṭum tevakaṉṉmi vacame kuṭuttatu . Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ Uḻai
ccāṇanaāṉa tillaikkiṟaivaṉ tāyaneṉ . Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ Ātrayaṉpālaṉ nakkaṉ vināyaka neṉ . Ippaṭi Icainte
ṉ Ālaccaṉ poṉṉampalakkūttaṉ comaneṉ . Ivai Eṉ Eḻuttu . Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ kauṇiyaṉ tirunaṭṭapperumāḷ
tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyāneṉ . Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ veḷḷaṟaik kavicayaṉ mātevaneṉ . Iṉṉilattukku pañcavaṉ māteviva
tiyiniṉṟum nirpāykaikku vaṭakkil varampukku Iṭṭu Īraṭittaṟaiyāle nirpāyakkaṭavutāka candrātittavar vaiccuk koṭupokak kaṭavu
tāṉamaikku Ivai poṉṉampalakkūttaṉ nṛttarācaṉ Eḻuttu . Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ Uḻaiccāṇan ṉaṭṭaṉ Akkaneṉ .
Digital edition of SII 12.166 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
